Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddCoinsAction, AttackAction, BuildRocketAction, DropItemAction, FillPistolAction, GetOxygenTankAction, GivePlansAction, InsultBehaviour, KickAction, MoveActorAction, MoveToEarthAction, OpenDoorAction, PickUpItemAction, PressButtonAction, ProduceOxygenTankAction, QuitGameAction, SkipTurnAction, SnapFingerAction, SpitBehaviour, SquirtAction, StunAction, TalkAction, UsePotionAction, VisitShopAction, WindowSmashAction
    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Actions. These represent things that the player can do.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public abstract java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor,
                                         GameMap map)
        Perform the Action.
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - The map the actor is on.
        Returns:
        a description of what happened that can be displayed to the user.

      • menuDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
        Returns a descriptive string
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        the text we put on the menu

      • hotKey

        public abstract java.lang.String hotKey()
        Returns the key used in the menu to trigger this Action. There's no central management system for this, so you need to be careful not to use the same one twice. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connascence
        Returns:
        The key we use for this Action in the menu.
